result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon D. Hughes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brandon D. Hughes is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brandon D. Hughes was found guilty of Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  Undergo any counseling/treatment per agent.  Participate in the CARE Program.  Defendant has 10 days credit if probation revoked.     ALL FINES/COSTS TO BE PAID THRU CLERK OR COURTS.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Defendant Brandon D. Hughes in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states recs.  VIS provided.  Atty Tsai agrees and enters NC pleas to all agreed charges.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on pleas/accepts/finds guilty.  VIS reviewed.  Atty Tsai makes statement on behalf of DE.  Court sentences.

Attorney Puck Tsai appeared by video means for Defendant Brandon D. Hughes. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin. State gives bond argument.  Court reinstates bond.    Reset for further return.  Return date scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorey Tsai give status.  Contact has not bee good.  State request warrant.   Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.  Stay lifted.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. does not know why DE not here.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant but stay  Return date scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 11-06-2015 09:00 am.
Return date at 11-18-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Brandon D. Hughes appeared by video means with Attorney ORourke.  Prosecuting Atty Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney ORourke advises defendant will likely be represented by Attorney Tsai.  State request signature bond w/ no contact with C.H.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Time limits waived.  $2500.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with C.H., her residence or her place of employment.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
